comments:
I20070306

Due to the daylight savings time problem, all of my launch configurations were out of sync with the workspace.  This produced an error in the log for each launch configuration as follows.  Since out of sync is not an "error", but rather a fairly normal condition that the user can get into, it shouldn't be logged like this because it looks like something bad happened.  In this case you may just want to call IFile.getContents with IReource.FORCE flag to read the contents regardless of whether it is in sync.

org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ResourceException: Resource is out of sync with the file system: '/org.eclipse.core.tests.runtime/All Runtime Tests.launch'.
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.localstore.FileSystemResourceManager.read(FileSystemResourceManager.java:610)
